introGate.tagline: All-in-one tools for developers, designers, and marketers

home.title: ToolBox - Online Tools Collection
home.description: Discover useful online tools for developers, designers, and marketers all in one place. Free tools including JSON Formatter, Color Picker, QR Code Generator, and more.

jsonFormatter.title: JSON Formatter - Developer Tools
jsonFormatter.description: Format, validate, and minify JSON data with this free online tool.
jsonFormatter.heading: JSON Formatter
jsonFormatter.subheading: Beautify your JSON data with our free formatter. Validate, minify, and copy with ease.

base64Encoder.title: Base64 Encoder/Decoder - Developer Tools
base64Encoder.description: Easily encode and decode text and data to Base64 format.
base64Encoder.heading: Base64 Encoder
base64Encoder.subheading: Encode text to Base64 or decode Base64 to text.

colorPicker.title: Color Picker - Designer Tools
colorPicker.description: Pick and convert colors in HEX, RGB, HSL formats.
colorPicker.heading: Color Picker
colorPicker.subheading: Select and convert colors in various formats.

codeRunner.title: Code Runner - Developer Tools
codeRunner.description: Run JavaScript and Python code directly in your browser.
codeRunner.heading: Code Runner
codeRunner.subheading: Execute JavaScript and Python code instantly in your browser.

regexTester.title: Regex Tester - Developer Tools
regexTester.description: Test regular expressions and view matching results in real-time.
regexTester.heading: Regex Tester
regexTester.subheading: Test regex patterns and see matching results instantly.

uuidGenerator.title: UUID Generator - Developer Tools
uuidGenerator.description: Generate UUID v1, v4, v7 and convert to various formats.
uuidGenerator.heading: UUID Generator
uuidGenerator.subheading: Generate unique UUIDs and convert them to various formats.

jwtDecoder.title: JWT Decoder - Developer Tools
jwtDecoder.description: Decode JWT tokens to view Header, Payload and validate.
jwtDecoder.heading: JWT Decoder
jwtDecoder.subheading: Analyze JWT tokens and verify their validity.

diffChecker.title: Diff Checker - Developer Tools
diffChecker.description: Compare two texts and visually identify differences.
diffChecker.heading: Diff Checker
diffChecker.subheading: Compare two texts and see the differences.

colorPalette.title: Color Palette - Designer Tools
colorPalette.description: Generate and manage harmonious color palettes.
colorPalette.heading: Color Palette
colorPalette.subheading: Create and save harmonious color combinations.

imageEditor.title: Image Editor - Designer Tools
imageEditor.description: Resize, crop, and apply filters to images.
imageEditor.heading: Image Editor
imageEditor.subheading: Edit images and apply various filters.

gradientGenerator.title: Gradient Generator - Designer Tools
gradientGenerator.description: Visually create CSS gradients and copy the code.
gradientGenerator.heading: Gradient Generator
gradientGenerator.subheading: Create beautiful CSS gradients with ease.

qrGenerator.title: QR Code Generator - Marketer Tools
qrGenerator.description: Generate QR codes from URLs, text, or contact information.
qrGenerator.heading: QR Code Generator
qrGenerator.subheading: Create QR codes for various types of information.

linkShortener.title: Link Shortener - Marketer Tools
linkShortener.description: Convert long URLs into short, memorable links.
linkShortener.heading: Link Shortener
linkShortener.subheading: Shorten long URLs into easy-to-remember links.

markdownEditor.title: Markdown Editor - Writer Tools
markdownEditor.description: Write markdown documents with real-time preview.
markdownEditor.heading: Markdown Editor

wordCounter.title: Word Counter - Writer Tools
wordCounter.description: Count and analyze characters, words, and sentences.
wordCounter.heading: Word Counter
wordCounter.subheading: Analyze text for character, word, and sentence counts.

loremIpsum.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator - Writer Tools
loremIpsum.description: Generate dummy text in various formats.
loremIpsum.heading: Lorem Ipsum Generator
loremIpsum.subheading: Generate placeholder text for your designs.

unitConverter.title: Unit Converter - Productivity Tools
unitConverter.description: Convert various units including length, weight, and temperature.
unitConverter.heading: Unit Converter

timezoneConverter.title: Timezone Converter - Productivity Tools
timezoneConverter.description: Convert time zones around the world.
timezoneConverter.heading: Timezone Converter
timezoneConverter.subheading: Easily convert between world time zones.

imageUpscaler.title: Image Upscaler - Designer Tools
imageUpscaler.description: Upscale images by 2x, 3x, or 4x with AI-powered enhancement for minimal quality loss.
imageUpscaler.heading: Image Upscaler
imageUpscaler.subheading: Enhance image resolution for sharper, clearer images.

imageConverter.title: Image Converter - Designer Tools
imageConverter.description: Convert between WebP, PNG, JPEG, GIF and more image formats easily. Supports batch conversion and resizing.
imageConverter.heading: Image Converter
imageConverter.subheading: Convert between various image formats with ease.

urlEncoder.title: URL Encoder/Decoder - Developer Tools
urlEncoder.description: Encode and decode URL special characters. Supports encodeURIComponent and encodeURI.
urlEncoder.heading: URL Encoder/Decoder
urlEncoder.subheading: Encode URL strings or decode encoded URLs.

cronParser.title: Cron Expression Parser - Developer Tools
cronParser.description: Parse and validate cron expressions, see next execution times, and build expressions visually.
cronParser.heading: Cron Expression Parser
cronParser.subheading: Parse cron expressions, check execution schedules, and build expressions with an intuitive visual builder.

jsonYamlConverter.title: JSON â†” YAML Converter - Developer Tools
jsonYamlConverter.description: Convert between JSON and YAML formats bidirectionally. Supports real-time conversion and indent settings.
jsonYamlConverter.heading: JSON â†” YAML Converter
jsonYamlConverter.subheading: Easily convert between JSON and YAML formats.

jsonToTypescript.title: JSON to TypeScript - Developer Tools
jsonToTypescript.description: Automatically convert JSON data to TypeScript interfaces/types. Supports nested objects and arrays.
jsonToTypescript.heading: JSON to TypeScript
jsonToTypescript.subheading: Paste JSON data to automatically generate TypeScript types.

unixTimestamp.title: Unix Timestamp Converter - Developer Tools
unixTimestamp.description: Easily convert between Unix Timestamp and date/time. Supports milliseconds/seconds and various timezones.
unixTimestamp.heading: Unix Timestamp Converter
unixTimestamp.subheading: Convert between Unix Timestamp (Epoch) and human-readable dates

sqlFormatter.title: SQL Formatter - Developer Tools
sqlFormatter.description: Format and minify SQL queries beautifully. Supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite and many more dialects.
sqlFormatter.heading: SQL Formatter
sqlFormatter.subheading: Format, minify SQL queries with support for multiple SQL dialects.

pomodoroTimer.title: Pomodoro Timer - Productivity Tools
pomodoroTimer.description: Boost your focus with the Pomodoro Technique. Manage your time efficiently with 25-minute focus and 5-minute break cycles.
pomodoroTimer.heading: Pomodoro Timer
pomodoroTimer.subheading: Improve your focus and productivity with the Pomodoro Technique.

asciiArtGenerator.title: ASCII Art Generator - Developer Tools
asciiArtGenerator.description: Convert text and images to ASCII art. Supports 15 FIGlet fonts and various character sets.
asciiArtGenerator.heading: ASCII Art Generator
asciiArtGenerator.subheading: Convert text or images to ASCII art.

phpUnserializer.title: PHP Unserializer - Developer Tools
phpUnserializer.description: Parse PHP serialize() data and visualize it as JSON.
phpUnserializer.heading: PHP Unserializer
phpUnserializer.subheading: Parse PHP serialized strings and convert them to JSON format.

imageCompressor.title: Image Compressor - Designer Tools
imageCompressor.description: Reduce image file size for web-optimized files. Supports presets and target size modes.
imageCompressor.heading: Image Compressor
imageCompressor.subheading: Reduce image file sizes optimized for web, social media, and email.

fakeDataGenerator.title: Fake Data Generator - Developer Tools
fakeDataGenerator.description: Easily generate fake data for testing and development. Supports various fields like name, email, phone, and more.
fakeDataGenerator.heading: Fake Data Generator
fakeDataGenerator.subheading: Easily generate fake data for testing and development.

codeTypingGif.title: Code Typing GIF - Developer Tools
codeTypingGif.description: Create code typing animation GIFs. Supports various themes and languages, perfect for showcasing code on Twitter, Slack, and more.
codeTypingGif.heading: Code Typing GIF
codeTypingGif.subheading: Generate code typing animations as GIF files.

emojiHashtagPicker.title: Emoji & Hashtag Picker - Marketer Tools
emojiHashtagPicker.description: Search and select emojis and hashtags by category and copy them. Perfect for creating social media posts.
emojiHashtagPicker.heading: Emoji & Hashtag Picker
emojiHashtagPicker.subheading: Easily search and copy emojis and hashtags.

metaTagPreviewer.title: Meta Tag Previewer - Marketer Tools
metaTagPreviewer.description: Preview and edit webpage meta tags. See how your page looks on Google, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Slack.
metaTagPreviewer.heading: Meta Tag Previewer
metaTagPreviewer.subheading: Edit meta tags and preview how your page appears on each platform.

headlineGenerator.title: Headline Generator - Marketer Tools
headlineGenerator.description: Generate compelling headlines with 15+ patterns. Supports numbers, questions, how-to, and various styles to boost clicks.
headlineGenerator.heading: Headline Generator
headlineGenerator.subheading: Enter your idea and generate compelling headlines with 15+ variation patterns.

countdownTimerGenerator.title: Countdown Timer Generator - Productivity Tools
countdownTimerGenerator.description: Create countdown timers showing time remaining until your target date. Offers various themes and customization options.
countdownTimerGenerator.heading: Countdown Timer Generator
countdownTimerGenerator.subheading: Create countdown timers for events, launches, deadlines, and more.

utmBuilder.title: UTM Builder - Marketer Tools
utmBuilder.description: Easily add UTM parameters to marketing campaign URLs. Supports QR code generation, preset saving, and history management.
utmBuilder.heading: UTM Builder
utmBuilder.subheading: Add UTM parameters to marketing campaign URLs and track traffic sources.

socialImageResizer.title: Social Image Resizer - Marketer Tools
socialImageResizer.description: Resize images to optimal sizes for SNS platforms at once. Supports 12+ presets including Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, TikTok.
socialImageResizer.heading: Social Image Resizer
socialImageResizer.subheading: Convert images to the right sizes for SNS platforms at once.
